name: SecurityAdvisor
description: Use SecurityAdvisor integration to coach your end users on cyber security threats they face. SecurityAdvisor's contextual coaching platform allows you to perform targeted coaching to users therefore making them more likely to change their behavior and reduce the number of incidents.
author: SecurityAdvisor
installMessage: Transaction processed. You will receive an email with instructions on obtaining your API key within 24 hours. See pack readme for more information.
